Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Establishes a giving internships for disabled veterans not fully employed program (G.I.V.E. Back NY)
Summary: Establishes a giving internships for disabled veterans not fully employed program (G.I.V.E Back NY); awards ten percent of available internships in the assembly youth participation program and the senate student program to eligible honorably discharged veterans with service connected disabilities.
LawCode: Add Art 6-B ยง97, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to establishing a giving internships for disabled veterans not fully employed program (G.I.V.E. Back NY)
